cab.content: (tHIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S OOTOtHMT). SECRET.G.T. 2064. WAR CABINET.OIL FUEL SITUATION.(Copy of a letter dated 18th Sept.1917, from the Fourth Sea Lordto the Secretary, War Cabinet,Dear Sir Maurice Hankey,With reference to your letter dated 2nd July, the particulars to date as regards oil fuel stocks are as follows(a) Stock of oil fuel in the United Kingdom this morning.(b) On the way from loading ports.(o) Quantities for. which it isanticipated shipping will be available during the ensuing four weeks.Yours very truly,,(Sgd) H.H.D. TOTHILL.Tons.676,000 278,000450,000,
